title: Wrong Answer
description: If you answer incorrectly, take a sip of your drink.

title: All Wrong
description: If everyone answers incorrectly, everyone takes a sip.

title: Right Answer
description: If you answer correctly, everyone else takes a sip.

title: Slow Start
description: The player who answers last takes a sip.

title: Quick Draw
description: The first player to answer correctly chooses someone to take a sip.

title: All Correct
description: If everyone answers correctly, everyone takes a sip.

title: Majority Rules
description: If the majority answers incorrectly, they take a sip; the minority also takes a sip.

title: Streaker
description: If a player gets three correct answers in a row, they take a sip.

title: Lucky Number
description: If the correct answer corresponds to your assigned number, take a sip.

title: Double Down
description: If you answer incorrectly twice in a row, take two sips.

title: Consolation Sip
description: If you answer incorrectly three times in a row, take three sips.

title: Random Victim
description: At the end of the round, a player is randomly selected to take a shot.

title: Speed Demon
description: The fastest player to answer correctly makes another player take a sip.

title: Time's Up
description: If you don't answer in time, take a sip.

title: Unanimous
description: If everyone answers correctly, the host chooses someone to take a sip.

title: Odd One Out
description: The player with the different answer is voted by the majority and takes a sip.

title: Team Turn
description: If half or more answer incorrectly, everyone takes a sip.

title: Early Bird
description: The first to answer, if wrong, takes a sip.

title: False Confidence
description: If you answer confidently but incorrectly, take a shot.

title: Perfect Round
description: If everyone answers correctly, all toast and take a sip.
